page.title: 08GROVE CENTRE-JULIE NOBLE.
page.content: Grove Centre is attached to Millbrook Junior School and is a place where continuing education can take place, under the Community Education Section of the Education Department of Oxfordshire County Council. The main aim of community education is to help individuals and groups to be creative, active and participative within society; to help realise their potential;and to help them improve the quality of life. The main areas of the Centre's work at present are adult education and work with young people. We have a staff of 70,some paid and some voluntary but all of the belief that Grove Centre needs to be a place where our clients feel safe,meeting together in a friendly,caring and supportive atmosphere.Our work is with people and their care must be our first priority.
